title: Find f(x) based on f''(x), f'(1) and f(2)

content.question: Let f be the function that is defined for all real numbers x and that has the following properties. (i) f″(x) = 24x − 18 (ii) f′(1) = −6 (iii) f(2) = 0 (a) Find each x such that the line tangent to the graph of f at (x, f(x)) is horizontal.

frqParts.text: Let f be the function that is defined for all real numbers x and that has the following properties. (i) f″(x) = 24x − 18 (ii) f′(1) = −6 (iii) f(2) = 0 (a) Find each x such that the line tangent to the graph of f at (x, f(x)) is horizontal.
(c) Find the average value of f on the interval 1 ≤ x ≤ 3.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
